SELECT DISTINCT S.SMSGROUP_NO, S.SMSGROUP_NAME, COUNT(U.USER_ID) USER_COUNT FROM SMSGROUP S INNER JOIN UNITGROUP U ON (S.SMSGROUP_NO=U.SMSGROUP_NO) GROUP BY S.SMSGROUP_NAME, S.SMSGROUP_NO ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(S.SMSGROUP_NO) DESC

mapper.select: SELECT S.SMSGROUP_NO, U.UNITGROUP_NO, S.SMSGROUP_NAME, U.USER_ID, US.USER_NAME, US.USER_HP FROM UNITGROUP U LEFT JOIN SMSGROUP S ON (U.SMSGROUP_NO=S.SMSGROUP_NO) INNER JOIN USERS US ON(U.USER_ID=US.USER_ID) WHERE S.SMSGROUP_NO=#{smsgroup_no}
SELECT US.USER_NAME, US.USER_HP FROM UNITGROUP U LEFT JOIN SMSGROUP S ON (U.SMSGROUP_NO=S.SMSGROUP_NO) INNER JOIN USERS US ON(U.USER_ID=US.USER_ID) WHERE S.SMSGROUP_NO=#{smsgroup_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE SMSGROUP SET SMSGROUP_NAME=#{smsgroup_name} WHERE SMSGROUP_NO=#{smsgroup_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sms (SMS_NO, SMS_CATEGORY, SMS_TITLE, SMS_CONTENT, SMS_TARGET, SMS_DATE, SMS_TYPE, SMS_GROUPID) VALUES (sms_seq.nextval, #{sms_category}, #{sms_title}, #{sms_content}, #{sms_target}, TO_DATE(#{sms_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), #{sms_type}, #{sms_groupid})
mapper.select: SELECT SMS_GROUPID, SMS_NO, SMS_CATEGORY, SMS_TITLE, SMS_CONTENT, SMS_TARGET, to_char(SMS_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') SMS_DATE, SMS_TYPE FROM SMS ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(SMS_NO)
